properties.name: app.storage.provider
properties.description: Storage provider to use for file attachments. Valid values: 'local' for local filesystem storage, 'minio' for MinIO object storage.

properties.name: app.storage.max-file-size
properties.description: Storage provider maximum file size in bytes.

properties.name: app.storage.allowed-extensions
properties.description: File extensions allowed for uploads. Comma-separated list of file extensions without dots, e.g. 'jpg,jpeg,png,webp,pdf,doc,docx,xls,xlsx,txt,csv,zip'.
